name: Car Game (r5t44games)
description:
Car Game

Flip, drift and spin across multiple levels in Car Game, the first complete 2d game by r5t44games. Car Game is a challenging physics rage-platformer in which the only goal is to get to the green flag.

Controls:

Move: Left/Right arrow keys

Jump: Up arrow key 

R: restart level 

(Using Left/Right arrow keys while in the air will tilt your car)

Note: ALL LEVELS ARE POSSIBLE!!
